TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Kanasaw’a’owang, title = Kanasaw’a’owang, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kanasaw’a’owang} }

S.FORM: U nisimsiman nu tamdaw tu kanasaw 'a'owang, matiya caay ku ma'uripay, anu eca caay kavana' a dademak. Nika, dademak cangra a mikilim tu kakaenen, anu awaay ku kakaenen i, maka muketep a li mi ku rakat tu cacay a remi'ad; anu adihay ku kakaenen i, a milawit tu cacay a kong ci ku rakat nangra. Adihay ku mamakaen nu kanasaw 'a'owang i riyar, ira ku kemaenay tu humung a kanasaw 'a'owang, uya caay kakemaen tu humung a kanasaw 'a'owang i, u maraemeday a vau i riyar atu ci pi tung u ku nikaenan nu nangra. Ruma satu, ira hu ku kemaenay tu kudih nu vutivuting.
